title: ICE compiling url2 in latest 1.51.0-dev nightly cross-compiling for Haiku

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I am maintaining the Rust builds for Haiku. For a few weeks, just after the nightly's version became 1.51.0, I have been getting an error when compiling cargo as part of the Rust build. This happens consistently when it has been building the `url2` crate. I am cross-compiling on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu for i686-unknown-haiku ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` note: rustc 1.51.0-dev running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -Z dual-proc-macros -Z macro-backtrace -Z tls-model=initial-exec -Z binary-dep-depinfo -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=0 -C linker=i586-pc-haiku-gcc --crate-type lib ``` The most recent SHA where the issue occured is 7ce1b3b24491cbe10669cbe2b5733c2fe7cfe5b7 ### Error output ``` Did not run successfully: exit code: 101 "/mnt/d/Rust/rust-nightly/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/bin/rustc" "--crate-name" "toml" "--edition=2018" "/home/nielx/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/toml-0.5.7/src/lib.rs" "--error-format=json" "--json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi,artifacts" "--crate-type" "lib" "--emit=dep-info,metadata,link" "-C" "opt-level=3" "-C" "embed-bitcode=no" "-C" "debuginfo=0" "--cfg" "feature=\"default\"" "-C" "metadata=4355a960eb450271" "-C" "extra-filename=-4355a960eb450271" "--out-dir" "/mnt/d/Rust/rust-nightly/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1-tools/i686-unknown-haiku/release/deps" "--target" "i686-unknown-haiku" "-C" "linker=i586-pc-haiku-gcc" "-L" "dependency=/mnt/d/Rust/rust-nightly/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1-tools/i686-unknown-haiku/release/deps" "-L" "dependency=/mnt/d/Rust/rust-nightly/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1-tools/release/deps" "--extern" "serde=/mnt/d/Rust/rust-nightly/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1-tools/i686-unknown-haiku/release/deps/libserde-38e0d7ed8ddcc78a.rmeta" "--cap-lints" "allow" "-Zdual-proc-macros" "-Zmacro-backtrace" "-Ztls-model=initial-exec" "-Z" "binary-dep-depinfo" "--sysroot" "/mnt/d/Rust/rust-nightly/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1" ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 31068 but the index is 31068', /mnt/d/Rust/rust-nightly/compiler/rustc_serialize/src/opaque.rs:602:21 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt 2: core::panicking::panic_bounds_check 3: rustc_metadata::rmeta::_DERIVE_rustc_serialize_Decodable_DecodeContext_a_tcx_FOR_CrateRoot:: for rustc_metadata::rmeta::CrateRoot>::decode::{{closure}} 4: rustc_metadata::rmeta::decoder::MetadataBlob::get_root 5: rustc_metadata::locator::CrateLocator::extract_one 6: rustc_metadata::locator::CrateLocator::extract_lib 7: rustc_metadata::locator::CrateLocator::find_library_crate 8: rustc_metadata::locator::CrateLocator::maybe_load_library_crate 9: rustc_metadata::creader::CrateLoader::load 10: rustc_metadata::creader::CrateLoader::maybe_resolve_crate 11: rustc_metadata::creader::CrateLoader::maybe_resolve_crate 12: rustc_metadata::creader::CrateLoader::maybe_process_path_extern 13: rustc_resolve::Resolver::extern_prelude_get 14: rustc_resolve::macros::::early_resolve_ident_in_lexical_scope 15: rustc_resolve::Resolver::resolve_path_with_ribs::{{closure}} 16: rustc_resolve::Resolver::resolve_path_with_ribs 17: rustc_resolve::imports::ImportResolver::resolve_imports 18: rustc_resolve::macros::::resolve_imports 19: rustc_expand::expand::MacroExpander::fully_expand_fragment 20: rustc_expand::expand::MacroExpander::expand_crate 21: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand_inner 22: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand::{{closure}} 23: rustc_data_structures::box_region::PinnedGenerator::new 24: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand 25: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::expansion 26: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 27: rustc_span::with_source_map 28: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run ```
